email_body: Hi Phillip, This message is to confirm our meeting with you on, Tuesday, October 30th from 9:00 am - 10:00 am, the location will be EB 3267. Attendees will be Monica Brown and Sheri Righi. Let me know if you have any questions. I can be reached at 713-345-6687. Thanks, Monica L. Brown Accenture Houston - 2929 Allen Parkway Direct Dial: +1 713 837 1749 VPN & Octel: 83 / 71749 Fax: +1 713 257 7211 email: monica.l.brown@accenture.com This message is for the designated recipient only and may contain privileged or confidential information. If you have received it in error, please notify the sender immediately and delete the original. Any other use of the email by you is prohibited.
